    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Checks if this weapon is in ember form each turn. Overrides Axe.tick()

      tick in class Item

      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this weapon.

    • getActiveSkill

      public WeaponAction getActiveSkill​(Actor target, java.lang.String direction)
      Return the active skill from the weapon that will be used against one target.
      Parameters:
      target - the target actor
      direction - the direction of target, e.g. "north"
      Returns:
      null by default because a weapon doesn't have any active skill. Otherwise, return a WeaponAction instance.
      See Also:
      for a self-direction skill instead of using this method (recommendation)
